ygData.subject: RE: Instruments in dual wield
ygData.msgSnippet: Instrument always goes in second melee slot, but you can never put anything in the first melee slot with the instrument.  You have 4 options, sing and fight
ygData.messageBody:
Instrument always goes in second melee slot, but you can never put anything
in the first melee slot with the instrument. You have 4 options, sing and
fight with weapons, stand back and play instruments, a combination of the 2,
or play instruments and punch with your fists for about 1-5 damage a round.

Faras Tar'Linedhel

http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/watercrystalstaff.html
